title: leaver buster
body: Okay so i already got rid of my 5 game 20 Min leaver buster then I play a game without leaver buster and I disconnect because of Direct X problem so i restart pc and got into game and when it finishes is says i have 5 pre made leaver buster again for 20 Min can someone help me

replies.body: I feel you, it is rubbish they should allow you to challenge it you get flagged leaver buster

Hey Kazu11,

Leaver Buster will automatically give you penalties if you are gone for too long, too often. Riot won't remove them, so you'll have to work them off. If you are commonly having issues with your client crashing or failing to connect, please post that here so we can help you fix them so you won't crash and leave matches so much. For more information on Leaver Buster go here; https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752714-LeaverBuster-FAQ

-DTN
